root.name: John Daly's ProStroke Golf
root.description: John Daly's ProStroke Golf is a golf game developed specifically for Playstation Move. It is the second entry in the ProStroke franchise made by Gusto Games; the first one being ProStroke Golf: World Tour 2007.Gameplay The game features mechanics called ProStroke View and ProStroke Swing, which helps players with a first-person view . The game will feature 12 courses, which have not yet been announced. It also features adjustable weather components. The developers hinted at new golf courses available through downloadable content Character Customization The game will feature character customization, which will mainly feature clothes and accesories like caps and sunglasses. You will be able to use John Daly's clothing brand to dress up your character.
